OEAPIINITCOM::IOEInitEvents

Public Member Functions

HRESULT OnInitOEAPI ()

Member Function Documentation

HRESULT OEAPIINITCOM::IOEInitEvents::OnInitOEAPI (  ) 

Event triggered when the OEAPI initializes.

HRESULT OEAPIINITCOM::IOEInitEvents::OnShutdownOEAPI (  ) 

Event triggered when the OEAPI shutdowns.
NOTE: dlls running in the address space of OE may receive this event or not. They will receive this event ALWAYS only if they hold OEAPI objects to let release them.
